Articles.Content:
The beta had these great RCS sounds, but I just noticed that that Release version doesn't seen to have them? I just did a totally fresh install with all settings default and tested it, not RCS sounds.

Does anyone know what happened?
are u sure?? it might be turned down which means u can hardly ecen hear it even if u turn the volume up to max

RCS sounds are definitely there in 1.2
I loved the RCS mod, and was pleasantly surprised that this is in stock now. Clean 1.2 steam install, and i hear RCS blocks and Vernors making sounds and better particles

5 hours ago, TheGuyNamedAlan said:

are u sure?? it might be turned down which means u can hardly ecen hear it even if u turn the volume up to max

hmm..thanks...I'll have to see if there's a setting I changed

EDIT - my quick stock test involved parking a craft with RCS on the launch pad and it didn't make any sound. I launched the same craft into orbit and I can hear the RCS. I'm not sure why it doesn't make sound on the launch pad, but at least I know it's working.

Edited October 19, 2016 by tjt

Exactly the same problem with the Crickets at night.  I hear nothing except if I crank the volume so high that I go deaf anytime I crash something.
I agree, RCS sound is too low.

Hopefully a quick hotfix could double the volume (at least) on these 2 things.
